mapper.insert: INSERT INTO room (ro_type, ac_id, ro_name, ro_basic_count, ro_max_count, ro_info, ro_count) VALUES (#{ro_type}, #{ac_id}, #{ro_name}, #{ro_basic_count}, #{ro_max_count}, #{ro_info}, #{ro_count})
mapper.update: update room set ac_id=#{ac_id}, ro_name=#{ro_name}, ro_basic_count=#{ro_basic_count}, ro_max_count=#{ro_max_count}, ro_info=#{ro_info}, ro_count=#{ro_count} where ro_type=#{ro_type}
